80 inline int CInteractiveViewLayer::GetKeysState() const
81 {
82  const IShapeView* viewPtr = GetViewPtr();
83  Q_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
84 
85  return viewPtr->GetKeysState();
86 }
87 
88 
89 inline int CInteractiveViewLayer::GetEditMode() const
90 {
91  const IShapeView* viewPtr = GetViewPtr();
92  Q_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
93 
94  return viewPtr->GetEditMode();
95 }
